page.title: 03HOUSING.
page.content: The majority of the block is rural and this is reflected in the housing of the area.Apart from the small village of {Preston Gubbals } and the 'ribbon' development at {Upper {Battlefield,}there are no sizable groups of dwellings. There are a few large farmhouses that are very attractive; notably { {Smethcote Manor}in the north(black and white),{Wood Farm, Hadnall }and the farmhouse opposite {Albrighton Hall. { }There are many pairs of cottages and isolated holdings all rather small but well kept. The {Upper Battlefield}group consists of about 18 mainly detached houses, some wooden 'chalet' type bungalows, and a number of 'between the wars'detatched houses. All of these are on the east side of the { {A49. }
